name: 穿越那仙界
description:
Welcome to "《穿越那仙界》". the game's language is only Simplified Chinese
The game is a chies major innovation based on the domestic fairy tale gameplay.
Game features: idle, national war with tens of thousands of people, ten major professions, each profession has 8 skills, and many equipment active skills (more than 20)
How to play: This is a mobile game of cultivating immortals with a lot of Moba gameplay, sect wars, and national wars with tens of thousands of people.

Innovative design:
[Consolidate the origin and pursue the path of true immortality]
Realm innovation, high-level players can refine realm pills for low-level players to take, allowing low-level players to rise quickly
(In the world of cultivating immortals, there is a huge gap between masters and casual cultivators. You can also defeat bosses to obtain realm pills to quickly improve your realm)

[Buddhist cultivating immortality can relieve liver pain]
You can get most of the resources by going online in just a few minutes every day. You can also choose to hang up in the wild to obtain spiritual stones, or hang up in the dungeon to obtain additional resources for cultivating immortals.

【Get rid of social fear and become a free and happy immortal】
There are 4 fixed countries and 16 sects in the game. There are no other teams. You don’t have to worry about not being able to join a team with high combat power. You don’t have to worry about being kicked during the Buddhist cultivation. No one has the authority to kick people. Let you be a Buddhist. Becoming more Buddhist while cultivating immortality

[Multiple professions highlight game features]
Whether you like a mage, a warrior, or an auxiliary, they all exist. There are a total of 10 professions in the game. Each profession has a unique 8 active skills. You can mix and match them as you like, and you will be happy as you wish.

[Rich gameplay and smooth mowing AI]
The gameplay in the game includes the Immortal Ascension Conference (several people fight with each other), Moba3V3 (team up with other people to fight against 3 other people), and Moba5V5. The AI has low combat power, so you can kill to your heart's content.

[Large-scale team battles are all within your reach]
Sect wars and national wars. Although the number of sects and countries is fixed, you can challenge for high positions, be the sect leader or the emperor. Once you become the leader, you can declare war on other sects or countries.
If you become the lord of the four kingdoms at the same time, you can collect taxes from all players (you can adjust the tax rate freely, whether you are a tyrant or a wise king, it all depends on you)~
